summary.value: My Webmention plugin for #WordPress should be kind of stable now… Time to ping the #IndieWeb #Conversations from @eschnou, @Barnaby Walters, @Ben Werdmuller, @Tom Morris, @Will Norris, and @Aaron Parecki. …and some <3 for Sandeep Shetty

content.html:
My Webmention plugin for #WordPress should be kind of stable now... Time to ping the #IndieWeb #Conversations from @eschnou, @Barnaby Walters, @Ben Werdmuller, @Tom Morris, @Will Norris, and @Aaron Parecki.

...and some <3 for Sandeep Shetty
content.text:
My Webmention plugin for #WordPress should be kind of stable now... Time to ping the #IndieWeb #Conversations from @eschnou, @Barnaby Walters, @Ben Werdmuller, @Tom Morris, @Will Norris, and @Aaron Parecki.



...and some <3 for Sandeep Shetty
